Interface IJugador

All Known Implementing Classes:
Jugador, JugadorMaquina
public interface IJugador
Interface that defines the contract for a Player. It specifies the operations a player can perform or that can be performed on a player.

  • Method Details

    • tomarCarta

      void tomarCarta(IMazo mazo) throws MazoVacioException
      Draws a card from the deck and adds it to the player's hand.
      Parameters:
      mazo - The deck (as an IMazo interface) to draw from.
      Throws:
      MazoVacioException - if the deck is empty.

    • jugarCarta

      boolean jugarCarta(Carta carta)
      Removes a specific card from the player's hand.
      Parameters:
      carta - The card to be played (and removed).
      Returns:
      true if the card was in the hand and removed, false otherwise.

    • puedeJugar

      boolean puedeJugar(int sumaMesa)
      Checks if the player has at least one valid move.
      Parameters:
      sumaMesa - The current sum on the table.
      Returns:
      true if the player has at least one card that can be played.

    • dejarMano

      List<Carta> dejarMano()
      Returns the player's entire hand and clears it. Used when a player is eliminated.
      Returns:
      A List containing all cards from the player's hand.

    • getMano

      List<Carta> getMano()
      Returns:
      The player's hand (as an unmodifiable list).

    • getNombre

      String getNombre()
      Returns:
      The player's name.

    • esHumano

      boolean esHumano()
      Returns:
      true if the player is human, false if AI.

    • getCartasEnMano

      int getCartasEnMano()
      Returns:
      The current number of cards in the player's hand.
